meta.content: The Monessen City School District is committed to providing learners with an efficient and effective education with dignity and respect. We truly believe that we are the Mon Valley's

div.data-slick: { "centerMode": true, "variableWidth": true, "arrows": false, "asNavFor": "#shuffle_main .shuffle-main", "infinite": false, "focusOnSelect": true, "vertical": false, "centerPadding": "0", "verticalSwiping": false }

div.div: The Monessen City School District is committed to providing learners with an efficient and effective education
with dignity and respect. We truly believe that we are the Mon Valley's "Best Kept Secret."

h3.a: **DATE CHANGE----ATTENTION: JUNIORS, SENIORS, and PARENTS.....PHEAA Financial Aid Webinar

div.div: DATE CHANGE----PHEAA will be offering a webinar on Thursday, April 30, from 6:00 to 7:00 PM to gain a complete understanding of the financial aid process. Please click READ FULL STORY or the link for more information. A registration link is included to Pre-Register.

h3.a: HS/MS Students Office 365 Email Account Information

div.div: The Monessen City School District is providing OFFICE 365 email accounts to all Middle School and High School students on a TRIAL basis. Please click READ FULL STORY or the link for directions for OFFICE 365 Email Access.
CHECK THIS OUT!!! Click the link to check out the Remote Learning Resources Page. Letters, information, web links, Internet Access Options, and MORE!!! All on one page for your convenience.

h3.a: Monessen School District Meal Program During Closure

div.div: Please click the link and fill out the form in order for students in grades Pre-K through Grade 12 to received breakfast/lunch during the school closure. Pick Up will be held at Monessen Elementary Center Cafeteria Doors between 11 AM til 12:30 PM.

h3.a: Monessen SD Remote Learning Connectivity Survey/Comcast Internet Essentials

div.div: Please click the link to find the Remote Learning Connectivity Survey and Information regarding Comcast Internet Essentials Program
Please click the link to be directed to the Resources for Students page and select the School/Grades you would like to browse!!!
Please click the link to visit the Monessen School District Facebook page for information and updates.
Please click the link to visit the Monessen PTA Facebook Page

What is Safe2Say Something? Safe2Say Something is a youth violence prevention program run by the Pennsylvania Office of Attorney General. Please CLICK the link for more information regarding this program.

article.aria-label: NO SCHOOL (ALL BUILDINGS) In Service Day

h3.a: NO SCHOOL (ALL BUILDINGS) In Service Day

div.div: Monessen, a very caring and unique school district, relies on versatility in meeting the needs of our very special young people by assisting them to become productive citizens and confident individuals in our own and world community.
